problems.description: Incorrect unit test expectation for multiply (expected 5 instead of 6), causing test failures
Invalid package versions (pytest==0.0.1 and requests==0.0.1) causing pip install to fail
logs directory missing so the CI log path can fail; created logs/ to ensure log file can be written

setup.py created the source distribution (sdist) in the wrong working directory when invoked from cd/; updated setup.py to chdir to its own directory so dist/ is created where cd_pipeline.bat expects it
Project did not ignore .venv/ which could leak local environments; added .venv/ to .gitignore
